margheritaPizza.name: Margherita Pizza

veggieSupremePizza.name: Veggie Supreme Pizza
veggieSupremePizza.desc: Loaded with bell peppers, mushrooms, onions, and olives.

chickenBiryani.name: Chicken Biryani
chickenBiryani.desc: Aromatic basmati rice cooked with tender chicken and spices.

muttonBiryani.name: Mutton Biryani
muttonBiryani.desc: Rich and flavorful biryani with tender mutton pieces.

vegBiryani.name: Veg Biryani
vegBiryani.desc: Fragrant vegetable biryani with mixed vegetables and saffron.

paneerButterMasala.name: Paneer Butter Masala
paneerButterMasala.desc: Creamy tomato-based curry with soft paneer cubes.

butterChicken.name: Butter Chicken
butterChicken.desc: Tender chicken in rich, creamy tomato-based sauce.

dalMakhani.name: Dal Makhani
dalMakhani.desc: Slow-cooked black lentils in a creamy, buttery gravy.

chickenBurger.name: Chicken Burger
chickenBurger.desc: Juicy grilled chicken patty with lettuce, tomato, and mayo.

vegBurger.name: Veg Burger
vegBurger.desc: Crispy vegetable patty with fresh lettuce and special sauce.

cheeseBurger.name: Cheese Burger
cheeseBurger.desc: Classic beef patty with melted cheese and pickles.

vegHakkaNoodles.name: Veg Hakka Noodles
vegHakkaNoodles.desc: Stir-fried noodles with fresh vegetables and soy sauce.

chickenFriedRice.desc: Wok-tossed rice with chicken, vegetables, and soy sauce.

manchurian.name: Manchurian
manchurian.desc: Deep-fried vegetable balls in a tangy Manchurian sauce.

masalaDosa.desc: Crispy rice crepe filled with spiced potato curry.

idliSambar.name: Idli Sambar

uttapam.name: Uttapam

gulabJamun.name: Gulab Jamun
gulabJamun.desc: Soft milk dumplings soaked in rose-flavored sugar syrup.

chickenWings.name: Chicken Wings
